column1: Just like the skin
column2: hair also needs constant care and attention to maintain its natural texture and shine. A regular wash will remove all the dirt and oil that gets accumulated on the hair over the entire day. However
column3: this will not protect the hair from losing the moisture or from the atmospheric pollutants from affecting the hair and the scalp. column2:
it will change to a clear liquid which in turn releases the water content infused in this Pantene Miracle Water. This action will leave an ultra-light finish to your hair that will help them maintain their natural moisture.
